risk_factors: No direct experience in application testing or QA processes
Skillset mismatch (focus on AI/ML rather than testing tools like Selenium, JIRA, Postman)
Potential lack of interest in a testing-focused role given career trajectory in AI/ML
growth_signals: Strong commitment to continuous learning (certifications, side projects)
Cross-domain knowledge in AI/ML and software engineering
selection_reason: While Abhijit Bomble demonstrates strong technical expertise in AI/ML and software engineering, his skillset and experience do not align with the requirements of the Application Testing Engineer role. The job demands hands-on experience with testing tools (e.g., Selenium, JIRA, Postman) and processes (e.g., SDLC, STLC, defect life cycle), which are absent from his resume. Additionally, his career trajectory and projects suggest a focus on AI/ML development rather than application testing, raising concerns about long-term interest and fit for this role. Despite his strong growth signals and technical depth, the mismatch in core skills and experience makes him unsuitable for this position.
